thread.title: BRIEF-Kaile To Transfer Unit's Creditors' Rights To China Huarong Asset Management's Hunan Branch

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Kaile To Transfer Unit's Creditors' Rights To China Huarong Asset Management's Hunan Branch

organizations.name: kaile science and technology co ltd
china huarong asset management's hunan branch

text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - Kaile Science And Technology Co Ltd Hubei :
* SAYS IT PLANS TO TRANSFER UNIT'S CREDITORS' RIGHTS OF 373 MILLION YUAN ($59.36 million) TO CHINA HUARONG ASSET MANAGEMENT'S HUNAN BRANCH Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2DO6pLm Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2835 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
